channel.title: Help with jarmaker
channel.description:
Ok im trying to jar my client and i got the jarmaker and everything.
[ul][li]For the output file i put my jarmaker folder[/li] [li]For the input directory i put my client folder[/li] [li]For the Manifest Template button under Main-Class I put Client[/li] [li]I didnt say make a .bat file and i clicked create jar, So it did.[/li][/ul]
But when I run it a window pops up and says "Could not find the main class. Program will exit. Does anyone know what i did wrong?

item.title: Help with jarmaker
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

Ok im trying to jar my client and i got the jarmaker and everything.

[ul][li]For the output file i put my jarmaker folder[/li]
[li]For the input directory i put my client folder[/li]
[li]For the Manifest Template button under Main-Class I put Client[/li]
[li]I didnt say make a .bat file and i clicked create jar, So it did.[/li][/ul]

But when I run it a window pops up and says
"Could not find the main class. Program will exit.
Does anyone know what i did wrong?

Read full topic
